ISSUE.TITLE: README badges aren't uniform
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It's a pretty simple task to to unify the badge styles and improve the look of the page. I'm happy to submit a pull request that would change this: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/697964/5793532/fe6f7e06-9efb-11e4-890b-b5b9384eefdd.png) to this: ![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/697964/5793533/0c351c26-9efc-11e4-8ccb-56d72437414f.png) You can also preview the changes to the README [here](https://github.com/dduugg/cgm-remote-monitor/blob/feature/badges/README.md). Ditto for the other nightscout repos. Let me know what you think.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #350 from nightscout/wip/time-update-fix Time update fix will resolve #348
